author: skynetua
content:
Hey, frens!
Den here, Matchmaker & Research Lead @ tr3butor!

We're building the contributor platform with on-chain identity, reputation, matching engine, quests / web3 jobs explorer, and other services, coupled with a vibrant and supportive community.

I'm always happy to help and meet more like-minded web3 builders here!

author: Deleted User
content: Hi all, I am considering applying for an Ethereum Foundation grant for voting technology. I wanted to ask if anyone could provide any thoughts or suggestions. The software would be open source and aim to provide a scalable and simple method for voting on Ethereum using trustless smart contracts. Thanks!
